pages.title: Altars
pages.text: If Magical Energy is the lifeblood of a witchâ€™s haunt, Altars are the heart that circulates it. Altars are formed by placing 6 of the same type of Altar Block in a 2x3 layout, and then topping it with a carpet of any colour. Altars can pull from plants in a 32 meter radius, and can distribute it to any devices in a 16 meter radius.

pages.name: How to Build
pages.text: The blocks around the altar must $(i)not$() be other altar blocks

pages.title: Modifiers
pages.text: Modifiers are grouped into 4 categories: cups, swords, wands, and pentacles. An Altar can only draw from the first item added of each Suite, and items of the same Suite do not stack.

Cups: Glass Bottles, Flower Pots, Goblets, and Filled Goblets. $(br2)Swords: Vanilla swords, Silver Swords, Athames, Bolines. $(br2)Wands: Candles, Torches, End Rods. $(br2)Pentacles: Precious Gems, Skulls and Heads, the Pentacle itself.
